author: Clayton Jacobs
comment: Attempted to contact developer directly.  No response.  Needs the following updates to be good:  * do not vibrate on whatever update constantly.  Have an option to turn off vibrate notification. * doesn't update to the stocks I type in and click ok * should be a drop down menu for currency, not hand typed.   * go from portrait orientation to landscape orientation, back to portrait the fonts get all jacked up. *  took 3-4 days for the app to pop up on my watch to install.

author: Dan H
comment: Like the design layout on the watch, but phone app lacks in field labels and some indication that confirms communication.  A simple FAQ would be good about proper field entry, etc.  Bummer..this app does not work on the latest smartwatch Fossil Q Explorist GEN3 which runs AW natively.  Have gone through reviews, tried suggested methods to resolve, but still no updates to initial entries.  Also, when searching for this Wear in Store, it doesn't show (perhaps needs to be marked as compatible)  Would really like to see this work.

author: Felix Simmons
comment: Gave a 5 star but had a question, is it possible to select different symbols? *update* they answered my question. I'm an IT guy at a financial firm, and this watch app is very well designed and functional. Great job guys!

reply.author: Pascal Peeters
reply.content: Yes, absolutely. Using the app on your phone you can select which stocks you want to watch; for example NASDAQ:AAPL will give you Apple. Symbols to be used as on finance.google.com

title: Love the look

author: Edward Liu
comment: Layout is good but I can't seem to switch the ticker symbols to different companies. And yes I am using Google finance format  Update. All good now. It takes the app a little while to update tickers once changed.

reply.author: Pascal Peeters
reply.content:
Hello, could i ask you to try following : 
- make sure 4 quotes are entered
- restart both your phone & watch after 1st time modification of the stock symbols.
Hope that works! otherwise don't hesitate to contact me and we'll try to find solution.

author: Phani Kajuluri
comment: Dont waste your time with this app, Whatever I do restart both phone and watch or reinstall on both multiple times it does not work. It shows default quotes that app provided and not showing my own even after updating in google finance quote format.

author: Zenon Pawluk
comment: Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Supports foreign exchanges etc. My ONLY suggestion would be to enable more than 4 stocks via pages. But still a great app!

reply.author: Pascal Peeters
reply.content: Thank you for the 5 star rating! 2 pages version coming soon, showing up to 8 quotes on your watch & portfolio.

title: Great Work

author: Garry Ee
comment: A little issue on setting up but ended up all work fine and is fabulous to my needs and a must to mention the fabulous support that is so friendly!
title: Nice app

author: Mark Randall
comment: Had installation issues, but had support to fix in minutes - works great now

reply.author: Pascal Peeters
reply.content: Thank you for the 5 star rating and feedback

title: Great app

author: Craig Alan
comment: This is not up to the minute.  Dont know the lag but not real time!

reply.author: Pascal Peeters
reply.content: Sorry to hear that the application is not functioning correctly. Could you send me some more information please? For which stocks are you retrieving the quotes? Data is coming from finance.google.com and should be refreshed every 10 seconds on Wifi and 60 seconds when on 3G/4G.

author: Dan Lam
comment: It is a great  concept apps on the market today for the Stocks finance, I did install an apps on my Google phone, but the symbol no mater how do I edited the symbol which I prefer on the phone, but  the symbol on my Watch still remain on the old stock as default, How can solve that problem. Thx

reply.author: Pascal Peeters
reply.content: Hello. Which stocks would you like to display? It is important to type the quote as on finance.google.com. For example : NASDAQ:AAPL for Apple.

author: xero xero
comment: Cool...I'm waiting on that 8 list. That would benefit me well.

author: Dustin brown
comment: Installed app.  Watch face doesn't show up in Android wear
